A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It gets a half-star because I got to see the words \"Star Wars\" floating in space after a two year wait. Otherwise\, what do either Episodes 7 or 8 have anything to do with the iconic movies George Lucas created. What an awful movie on so many levels. What was a jewel of a story has now been pawned off\, and it's recipients have treated it with all the respect of costume jewelry. The professional critics must have watched a different film than the one I just sat through.
